## Quivr  
Quivr is an AI-powered tool that automates customer ticket replies, directly inside your ticketing system. It helps support teams save time, improve CSAT, and scale their operations.  

## Quivr for Zendesk  
Quivr integrates into your Zendesk workflow and offers powerful features to assist your agents:  

- ğŸš€ Automatic Replies: Quivr can auto-send responses when confidence is high and conditions are met. 
-  âœ¨ Reply Drafts: Quivr suggests high-quality responses based on the full ticket context, ready for agent review and editing.
- âœï¸ Draft Assistant: Summarize, translate, correct, or rephrase any draft in one click.  
- ğŸ” Deep Context Awareness: Understands ticket history, customer messages, metadata, and even connects to your internal tools.  
- ğŸ† Productivity Boost: Speeds up response time and reduces cognitive load.  
- ğŸ”„ Fully Integrated: Use Quivr directly within Zendesk, no tab switching.  

Note: Requires an active Quivr account.

## Data & Privacy  
**Data Accessed:** Quivr accesses ticket data including ticket content, conversation history, customer messages, and ticket metadata (such as tags, status, and custom fields) from your Zendesk account.  
**Data Used:** This data is processed by Quivr's AI to generate relevant reply suggestions, automate responses, and assist agents with draft editing features.  
**Data Stored:** Quivr stores ticket interactions and generated responses to improve service quality and enable features like auto-replies. Data is retained in accordance with our data retention policies.  
**Purpose:** All data processing is solely for the purpose of providing AI-powered ticket response automation and agent assistance within your Zendesk workflow.  
**Compliance:** Quivr is SOC 2 and GDPR compliant.
